entries.name: Magic resistant
entries.properties: +2 magic resist.

entries.name: Natural swimmer
entries.properties: Submerged condition does not apply.

entries.name: Breathe water
entries.properties: Breathes underwater as if it were open air.

entries.name: Water yin and air yang
entries.properties:
Must be submerged in water (entire body, excluding head) for at least 8 hours a week or you will permanently transform into a raceTerran.
Must be entirely out of water for at least 8 hours a week or you will permanently transform into a raceTatsu.
In either case, all racial bonuses are replaced with the permanent race's.

entries.name: Form of feet and fin
entries.properties:
After one turn of being submerged in water, legs are replaced by a tail-like fin.
After one turn of being entirely out of water, the tail-like fin is replaced with legs.
During either of these transformations, you are considered prone and unable to move.
Transformation does not occur if you are wearing any leg-wear or feet-wear.

entries.name: Attuned influence
entries.properties:
Automatically gained when INF >= 5
Spells that cost >= 5 mana cost 1 less mana.
Spell ST +2

entries.name: Unarmed attack
entries.properties: AR -5

entries.name: Throw
entries.properties: Typical attack to throw a throwable weapon at a target. AR is DEX modified.  See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Fire
entries.properties: Typical attack to fire a ranged weapon. AR is DEX modified. See weapon for range and damage.

entries.name: Reload
entries.properties: Reload a ranged weapon. See weapon for action points needed to reload.

entries.name: Equip item
entries.properties:
Equip an item per free hand from your side or back.
For example, if you carry several javalins and you throw one, another must be equipped before use.

entries.name: Melee attack
entries.properties: Typical attack at a target with any melee weapon.  See weapon for damage.

entries.name: Dodge
entries.properties: Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.

entries.name: Move
entries.properties: May move 5 feet on level ground.  Difficult terrain takes 2 action points.

entries.name: Run
entries.properties: May move 30 feet on level ground and 15 feet on difficult terrain.

entries.name: Climb
entries.properties: With a successful skillAthletics check, may climb 5 feet on reasonably climbable surfaces such as trees or cliffs.

entries.name: Jump
entries.properties:
Jump forward 5 ft or upward 3 ft while standing still; jump forward 8 ft or upward 4 ft while running.
This is for a medium creature. For every creature size large, double amount. For every creature size smaller, half amount.

entries.name: Shout command
entries.properties:
May shout up to four words as a command. Make a skillPersuasion check as needed.
Response is only possible on target's turn.

entries.name: Ask question
entries.properties: May make a one sentence inquiry to a nearby target and they may respond in one sentence. Make any check as needed.

entries.name: Use cover
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to full or half cover.
If maneuvering while under cover is needed to attack (e.g. going from a crouch to a stand, or spinning around a column), 1 action point is needed to get out of cover, and one to get back in cover.

entries.name: Drink
entries.properties:
Can drink or administer (to a willing target) a vial of liquid.
If target is unconscious, requires a skillSleight of hand check > 13, otherwise the liquid is not swallowed.

entries.name: Stabilize
entries.properties: Provides one death save to an unconscious target.

entries.name: Improvise
entries.properties: Explain to the DM what you want to do, and allow him to decide how and if it can be done.  Expect checks and actions to be required.

entries.name: Disengage
entries.properties:
May move without enabling an abilityOpportunity attack.
No attack action can be made on the same turn.

entries.name: Hide
entries.properties:
Must be out of the line of sight of all opponents.
Allows a skillStealth check to be made. See skillStealth for more information.

entries.name: Search
entries.properties:
Requires you to be in range to the space being searched.
Search a space for one of the following:
  • General items of interest.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for a hidden items.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for specified clues.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden traps.
  • Make an skillInspection check to search for hidden compartments or doors.

entries.name: Ready
entries.properties:
You may make an action, costing <= 3 action points, on any other character's turn. You may make the action in between actions of a character, but must declare you are doing so before the character begins the action.
If you perform a reaction, you lose your chance to make this special action.

entries.name: Opportunity attack
entries.properties: If an enemy that was once within reach, performs a move action to be out of reach, you may make a free melee attack against that enemy, costing <= half (round up) of your action points (at least 3).

entries.name: Grapple
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you may move the target as if slowed, and the target cannot attack.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.
If humanoid, you cannot perform any action that requires your hands while grappling.

entries.name: Shove
entries.saving throw: T: STR ST >= A: STR check
entries.properties:
On hit, you move the target 5 ft away.
If your STR check >= target's STR ST + 5, you move the target 10 ft away and the target is knocked prone.
+5 STR check for each size smaller the target is; -5 STR check for each size larger the target is.

entries.name: Delay
entries.properties:
For the encounter, moves your turn after the next character's turn.
This may be repeated until you reach the bottom of the initiative order

entries.name: Hilt butt
entries.properties:
Gained when a hilted weapon is equipped.
Hit target with butt end of hilt for 2 bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Block
entries.properties: Gained if armor indicates abilityBlock is possible. If dodge is negative, before adding the block's dodge modifier, set the dodge to 0. Add dodge to armor and magic resist during AD.
